title: How To Start A Farm In Five Minutes

tasks.task: Experience of growing up with stereotypes and changing perceptions
subtasks: Growing up with images of farms as red barns, cows, and gray-haired men in overalls
Realizing the role of vegetables in farming and the continuous dependence on farms for food
Childhood aspirations excluding farming as a career
Recognition of technological advancements but concerns about environmental and health impacts
Learning about the importance of community, purpose, and connection through farming
Discovering diverse colors in produce like green, purple, yellow, and orange tomatoes, purple cauliflower, and corn leaves making music
Understanding the connection between individual farm actions and larger societal impacts (butterfly effect)
Requesting support through an Indiegogo campaign
Emphasizing the unconventional approach as an organic farmer
Providing transparency about the use of donations and offering additional resources

tasks.task: Experience of growing up with stereotypes and changing perceptions**
Learning about the importance of community, purpose, and connection through farming**
